content: *please note this is the ad-free easy to print version of this pattern you can find the free version on my blog www theturtletrunk com ---------------------------------- introducing the easy breezy super chunky beanie crochet pattern this pattern is beginner friendly and easily adjustable to make it perfect for you the pattern includes sizes for all heads the ribbed texture is simple modern and perfect for the cooler seasons the super bulky yarn make this beanie super warm and it works up fast pattern includes -detailed instructions in 8 sizes ranging in sizes newborn-adult large -photos for reference -link to free video tutorial -gauge pattern difficulty easy yarn used super bulky weight 6 hook size n / 9 00 mm standard us crochet terms pattern includes 8 sizes 0-3 months 3-6 months 6-12 months 1-3 years 3-10 years adult small adult medium and adult large my patterns including all photographs are copyrighted you may not copy re-distribute or sell my pattern
